name: Ragnov
overview: Ragnov was the first game project of Softeyes in the late 1980s. A 2D sideways multi-directionally scrolling shooter. They did create a demo and sent that to several publishers, but the game never worked out and they started working on Hoi . Ragnov featured parallax scrolling and a split-screen mode for two players. The game's concept was processed into Hoi level 3 (where Hoi flies around with a jetpack on his back).
